original_title: Quest for Thousand-Pound Bluefin: Prince Edward Island
overview: Join the mission as we travel to one of the most amazing fisheries in the world to search for the elusive 1000-pound Bluefin Tuna that roam the cold Atlantic waters off of Prince Edwards Island, Nova Scotia. We team up with Greg Norton of Tightline Tours along with veteran anglers, Kenny Cirks, and Barry Brightenburg to fish the giants. This film is combines info, techniques and non-stop action!
title: Quest for Thousand-Pound Bluefin: Prince Edward Island
